release_notes.en-US: This version fixes some visual glitches in dialogs, and the image quality option which apparently has been broken since 2011(!). There's also some small updates to the French translation. https://github.com/darktrojan/shrunked/compare/VERSION_4.5.4...VERSION_4.5.5

text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

release_notes.en-US: Fixes a bug when uploading attachments that are larger than 768kB after resizing. Such attachments are now saved to a temporary file (as was the case in some earlier versions). https://github.com/darktrojan/shrunked/compare/VERSION_4.5.3...VERSION_4.5.4

text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

release_notes.en-US: Updates for Thunderbird 68. https://github.com/darktrojan/shrunked/compare/VERSION_4.5.2...VERSION_4.5.3

text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

release_notes.en-US: This version stops depending on some stuff that was removed from Thunderbird. https://github.com/darktrojan/shrunked/compare/VERSION_4.5.1...VERSION_4.5.2

text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

release_notes.en-US: Required update for compatibility with Thunderbird 67. https://github.com/darktrojan/shrunked/compare/VERSION_4.5...VERSION_4.5.1

text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

release_notes.en-US: This is the first version of Shrunked that's only for Thunderbird (if you exclude the very earliest versions from almost 10 years ago). The major changes are removal of code that's only for Firefox, and an overhaul/modernisation of the code. https://github.com/darktrojan/shrunked/compare/VERSION_4.4.8...VERSION_4.5

text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

release_notes.en-US: This update makes Shrunked compatible with the release version of Thunderbird again. https://github.com/darktrojan/shrunked/compare/VERSION_4.4.4...VERSION_4.4.8

text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

release_notes.en-US: This update makes Shrunked compatible with the release version of Thunderbird again. https://github.com/darktrojan/shrunked/compare/VERSION_4.4.4...VERSION_4.4.6

text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

release_notes.en-US: Just changing two letters to fix something which doesn't work in Thunderbird any more. This will be the last version of Shrunked to work in Firefox. I will not be turning it into a WebExtension. https://github.com/darktrojan/shrunked/compare/VERSION_4.4.3...VERSION_4.4.4

text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

release_notes.en-US: https://github.com/darktrojan/shrunked/compare/VERSION_4.4.2...VERSION_4.4.3

text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

release_notes.en-US: This version fixes another bug for SeaMonkey, caused by my laziness and revealed by the release of SeaMonkey 2.46. https://github.com/darktrojan/shrunked/compare/VERSION_4.4.1...VERSION_4.4.2

text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

release_notes.en-US: This version fixes resizing on SeaMonkey which was broken by the last update. Also it disables the option to resize attachments when they are added (on SeaMonkey), which just doesn't work. https://github.com/darktrojan/shrunked/compare/VERSION_4.4...VERSION_4.4.1

text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

release_notes.en-US: With this version Shrunked now stores resized images in memory rather than on the filesystem. There are also a number of minor bug fixes. https://github.com/darktrojan/shrunked/compare/VERSION_4.3.2...VERSION_4.4

text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

release_notes.en-US: This is a minor update to allow setting the resizing attachment pref in the UI. https://github.com/darktrojan/shrunked/compare/VERSION_4.3...VERSION_4.3.1

text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

release_notes.en-US: Notable changes in this version: * Five translations that have not been updated in a long time have been removed. * Email attachments are now resized when they are attached, not when the email is sent. This change can be reverted with the pref extensions.shrunked.resizeAttachmentsOnSend, although this option may not exist forever. * Alternatively, email attachments can be resized by right-clicking on them. https://github.com/darktrojan/shrunked/compare/VERSION_4.2.3...VERSION_4.3

text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

release_notes.en-US: This update of Shrunked has a translation for Spanish users for the first time. Spanish is one of the most popular languages for users of Shrunked. https://github.com/darktrojan/shrunked/compare/VERSION_4.2.2...VERSION_4.2.3

text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

release_notes.en-US: This release contains a Czech translation for the first time, and updates for the German and Italian translations. Thanks to all my translators. https://github.com/darktrojan/shrunked/compare/VERSION_4.2.1...VERSION_4.2.2

text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

release_notes.en-US: Translation updates for French and German. https://github.com/darktrojan/shrunked/compare/VERSION_4.2...VERSION_4.2.1

text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

release_notes.en-US: This release has a number of tweaks to the resize preview dialog. Most noticeably, Shrunked now provides an estimate of the resized image's file size. (This is only an estimate, for the sake of speed a simpler resizing is done.) Also, speakers of some languages will see an appeal for help with translation. If you can help, please see the project issues on GitHub. https://github.com/darktrojan/shrunked/compare/VERSION_4.1...VERSION_4.2

text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

release_notes.en-US: This version is a rewrite of the code for Firefox, to reflect upcoming changes in Firefox itself. There's also a new Dutch translation and some other minor changes. https://github.com/darktrojan/shrunked/compare/VERSION_4.0.3...VERSION_4.1

text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

release_notes.en-US: This version fixes a rounding error which produces some "interesting" looking images.

text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

release_notes.en-US: This version fixes a major bug in reading EXIF data, which prevented automatic orientation of images. It also has a Croatian translation for the first time. https://github.com/darktrojan/shrunked/compare/VERSION_4...VERSION_4.0.2

text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

release_notes.en-US: New in version 4: * Rewrite of the resizing code. Resizing should now be faster and the application still totally responsive during resizing. * Improved handling of resizing operations when composing email (especially when resizing attachments). Full changes: https://github.com/darktrojan/shrunked/compare/VERSION_3.2.3...VERSION_4

text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

release_notes.en-US: Since 3.2.2: * Fixed the context menu item to show up in SeaMonkey * Restored the 'Original size' option when resizing attachments * Added a checkbox in the options for logging https://github.com/darktrojan/shrunked/compare/VERSION_3.2.2...VERSION_3.2.3

text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

release_notes.en-US: Minor update to add a much-needed context-menu item when to resize an image when composing an email. https://github.com/darktrojan/shrunked/compare/VERSION_3.2.1...VERSION_3.2.2 (If you missed the previous version's release note, see https://addons.mozilla.org/addon/shrunked-image-resizer/versions/3.2.1)

release_notes.en-US: This version has a lot of big changes under the hood to prepare for future changes in the Mozilla platform, and to create a better user experience. Almost every file has been changed in some way. New features: * The resize options window now has a preview box showing what images are to be resized, and what size they will become. * When images are added to an email message, a notification bar pops up (as it does in Firefox), instead of the resize window. * Better checks on which images to resize in an email. https://github.com/darktrojan/shrunked/compare/VERSION_3.1...VERSION_3.2.1 (Version 3.2 was not released.)

release_notes.en-US: This version features a rewrite of the Shrunked options dialogs, a new icon and numerous minor bug fixes. For all changes since v3.0, see https://github.com/darktrojan/shrunked/compare/VERSION_3.0.1...VERSION_3.1

release_notes.en-US:
Version 3 of Shrunked does image resampling in a separate thread. This should make it faster and make the user interface more responsive.

It also updates Shrunked for the per-window private browsing changes in Firefox etc..

Fixes a bug in the EXIF handler which caused some resized images to be unreadable.
Fixes a bug which caused Shrunked to stop when resizing multiple files.

release_notes.en-US:
Now with Italian.

I've made some modifications to support multiple uploads, which will be a part of Firefox 3.6 (but not beta1). Please report any problems to shrunked@darktrojan.net.
